actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide supplemental pension payments to certain veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay supplemental pension payments to disabled veterans who are permanently housebound but do not qualify for specified aid and attendance payments, or who are 75 years of age or older, and do not qualify for such aid and attendance payments. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide supplemental pension payments to certain veterans.
